WorkflowInfo.Name: Demo Workflow
WorkflowInfo.Description: Sample demo workflow, feel free to modify it as you see fit.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:Ping;Assembly=Ping, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetOperatingSystem;Assembly=GetOperatingSystem, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:CPU;Assembly=CPU, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToPlainText;Assembly=ConvertToPlainText, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:DiskSpace;Assembly=DiskSpace, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:Memory;Assembly=Memory, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ServiceStatus;Assembly=ServiceStatus, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:SystemUptime;Assembly=SystemUptime, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:GetWindowEventLogs;Assembly=GetWindowEventLogs, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:URLCheck;Assembly=URLCheck, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:SendAyehuIM;Assembly=SendAyehuIM, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:Terminate;Assembly=Terminate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping1" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Ping" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="1" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns11:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns11:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:SendAyehuIM Channel="Listener" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="" DestinationNumber="1" DisplayName="Send eyeShare IM" ShiftLevel="1" IsValid="True" TemplateNumber="0" TypeName="SendAyehuIM" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendAyehuIM1" Timeout="00:00:00" DestinationType="User" Description="Send a eyeShareIM alert to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" Body="Failed to ping localhost" To="Admin" MessageType="Custom" /> <ns12:Terminate DisplayName="Terminate" x:Name="terminate1" TerminationReason="Workflow completed" IsValid="True" TypeName="Terminate" Description="Terminate the current branch in workflow" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> <ns1:GetOperatingSystem IsValid="True" x:Name="getOperatingSystem1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Get Operating System" Password="" Description="Get the operating system of the specified host" HostId="1" TypeName="GetOperatingSystem" UserName="" /> <ns2:CPU IsValid="True" x:Name="cpu1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="CPU" DisplayName="Get CPU" Password="" Description="Get the selected CPU inforamtion" HostId="1" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available" UserName="" /> <ns3:ConvertToPlainText DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" x:Name="convertToPlainText1" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." IsValid="True" Value="%cpu1%" /> <ns4:DiskSpace IsValid="True" x:Name="diskSpace1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="DiskSpace" DisplayName="Get Disk Space" Path="c:" Password="" Description="Get the selected disk space inforamtion" HostId="1" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available" UserName="" /> <ns5:Memory IsValid="True" x:Name="memory1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="Memory" DisplayName="Get Memory" Password="" Description="Get the selected memory inforamtion" HostId="1" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available" UserName="" /> <ns6:ServiceStatus IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStatus1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get Service Status" ServiceName="IISADMIN" Password="" Description="Display the status of the selected service" HostId="1" TypeName="ServiceStatus" UserName="" /> <ns7:SystemUptime IsValid="True" x:Name="systemUptime1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Get System Uptime" Password="" Description="Get the operating system's uptime in seconds" HostId="1" TypeName="SystemUptime" UserName="" /> <ns8:GetWindowEventLogs Password="" Description="Get the logs of the windows according to the event type." TimeInSeconds="60" FilterComputer="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Get Windows Event Logs" IsValid="True" HostId="1" FilterSource="" FilterDescription="" FilterEventCode="" FilterUser="" MaxAge="05:00:00" x:Name="getWindowEventLogs1" Timeout="00:01:00" FilterType="" UserName="" EventType="Application" FilterCategory="" TypeName="GetWindowEventLogs" /> <ns9:URLCheck SrcPassword="{x:Null}" Proxy="" TimeInSeconds="60" TextToSearch="ayehu" DisplayName="URL Check" IsValid="True" SiteId="-1" Password="" TypeName="URLCheck" SiteName="{x:Null}" Description="Search a phrase in the specified URL" SrcUserName="{x:Null}" x:Name="urlCheck1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" ProxyUrls="{x:Null}" isChecked="False" byPass="False" Url="http://www.ayehu.com" /> <ns10:SendAyehuIM Channel="Listener" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="" DestinationNumber="1" DisplayName="Send eyeShare IM" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" TemplateNumber="0" TypeName="SendAyehuIM" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendAyehuIM2" Timeout="00:00:00" DestinationType="User" Description="Send a eyeShareIM alert to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" Body="Demo workflow completed the results are:
Operating System: %getoperatingsystem1%
CPU: %converttoplaintext1%
Disk Space: %diskspace1%
Service Status: %Servicestatus1%
URL Check: %URLCheck1%" To="Admin" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>1</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
